post.text: President Obama endorses Hillary Clinton for president: "I don't think there's ever been someone so qualified to hold this office." http://hrc.io/AreYouIn

comment.author: Nathaniel
comment.text: I can just see the commercial... Obama: I believe Hillary Clinton will be just as good a president as I was... Voiceover: This has been a paid for announcement from the "Elect Donald Trump" campaign ;)

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Your point? The man was elected twice - in a landslide both times. Yes, racists will react that way but they are outnumbered
